name: —
description:
A small game by grey & boreal vaisius. Our first publicly released game thing.

This game was inspired by playing with toy train tracks. Pieces get randomly chosen and you can place or re-roll each piece (z & x respectively). There is a spark chasing the head of the the track, if you choose an impassable piece, or the spark reaches the end of the track you lose.

You can play for as long as you can survive, there is a high score tracker in the top left, the white circle is how long your current run is, the light grey circle is your longest run.

Feetchurz

  • basic
  • simple
  • minimalistic
  • short
